title: Chatty AI and Protein-Predicting Algorithm Defined the Year in Emerging Tech
description: Amid tough market conditions, technology developers continued to make important strides in 2022, offering a glimpse of digital capabilities that are poised to transform entire industries in the years ahead.

title: Tesla Stock Headed for Its Worst Year on Record
description: Elon Musk’s electric-vehicle maker has shed more than $700 billion in market valuation in 2022.

title: Huawei Says It Is Out of 'Crisis Mode' as Annual Revenue Stabilized
description: Despite punishing U.S. restrictions, Huawei it reported growth in its telecom infrastructure business and flat overall revenue for 2022.
